Posts.Content: Hi, I am new to this and trying to get better. Finished CAT chemo three weeks today. Lost friends, car, and who knows what else. Ankles swollen, finger and toes numb and tingling. Glad to be finish chemo, but when does it get better?
Posts.Title: Where do I go from here?

Posts.Content: GYN advice. Use olive oil. Its natural and no side effects
Posts.Title: I need info on sex!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
